name: ts-bouncer
description: Automatic validator generation for serializable TypeScript interfaces using the Compiler API

scripts.prepare: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.test: yarn start 'test/**/*in*.ts' -o test/ && tsc test/test.ts && node test/test.js
scripts.build: tsc index.ts --outDir bin && cp basic_validators_template.ts bin/basic_validators.ts && chmod +x bin/index.js

author: Gerard del Castillo <gerarddelcastillo@gmail.com> (https://github.com/aslogd)
